title: Bug 116609[Regression]Color orange doesn't work.
description: Bug 116609[Regression]Color orange doesn't work. Description:Color orange doesn't work.Steps to reproduce:1.
OB: When inserting a report item and setting the color or background color to orange, the orange color does not work as expected. The preview shows that the color should be orange, but the actual result is that it is not properly displayed.
EB: The expected behavior is that when the color or background color is set to orange, the preview should show the report item with the correct orange color.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Insert a report item. 2. Set the color or background color of the report item to orange. 3. Observe that the orange color does not appear as expected.
